Our Team

Sheryl Graham
Chief Operating Officer
Sheryl oversees the firm’s business operations including sales, marketing, business development, and communications.

Chris Anderson

Chief Product Officer
Chris leads Product Management, Design, and Marketing functions globally. He is responsible for the core products and features.

Susan Cox

Chief Financial Officer
Susan is Chief Financial Officer at Pursuit, where she leads the finance, facilities and information technology teams. “The care and attention to detail paid by the whole team at Pursuit Co is really second to none. It comes as no surprise to me that they work with some of the industry leaders and attract top talent worldwide” Sara Jones Client

Get in Touch
